response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Considering its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this extraordinary piece, I am offering it to you at a special price of $15,000. I trust that you will find its value exceeds this amount and appreciate the opportunity to discuss its potential benefits with you further.", "product_price": 15000}
